reviewText: what a drama, very painful inful,the actor was great,i hope he makes more movies..10 stars mm
This is a very good move.  I really enjoyed the action and the story line.  Buy it you will like it.

I was angered when I discovered that this movie was in an Asian language without English subtitles. I purchased this through my TV which streams Amazon videos and I did not see the previous reviewers comments.  My loss of $3.99.  Will be more careful in the future.
I love good Korean and other Asian flicks and most are better than good! However this is the second rental from Amazon that has no sub titles. C'Mon guys, if there are no sub titles then say so!!
